document_data.title: Keys from the Golden Vault
document_data.author: [[Amanda Hamon]], [[Christopher Perkins]]
document_data.edition1: <!-- leave blank if there is only one -->
document_data.mainbody:
Keys from the Golden Vault'' includes the following adventures:
* "[[/The Murkmire Malevolence|The Murkmire Malevolence]]", revolving around the theft of a mystery egg from a museum to prevent a catastrophe.
* "[[/The Stygian Gambit|The Stygian Gambit]]", featuring a heist in an infernally themed casino.
* "[[/Reach for the Stars|Reach for the Stars]]", with a search of a [[Far Realm]]–warped mansion for ''The Celestial Codex''.
* "[[/Prisoner 13|Prisoner 13]]", wherein the adventurers must retrieve a key from a crime boss imprisoned in [[Revel's End]].
* "[[/Tockworth's Clockworks|Tockworth's Clockworks]]", in which a [[deep gnome]] town is besieged by clockwork automata.
* "[[/Masterpiece Imbroglio|Masterpiece Imbroglio]]", with retrieval of a stolen painting from a [[thieves' guild]].
* "[[/Axe from the Grave|Axe from the Grave]]", a story about helping a deceased bard rest by finding their stolen [[mandolin]].
* "[[/Vidorant's Vault|Vidorant's Vault]]", the vault of a famous thief from which a stolen diadem must be recovered.
* "[[/Shard of the Accursed|Shard of the Accursed]]" where to save a town from destruction, adventurers must employ a magical shard to mend a giant's broken heart.
* "[[/Heart of Ashes|Heart of Ashes]]", this time finding a king's lost heart to once again prevent a catastrophe striking a kingdom.
* "[[/Affair on the Concordant Express|Affair on the Concordant Express]]", on a train through the planes, adventurers must get information from someone.
* "[[/Party at Paliset Hall|Party at Paliset Hall]]", with a theft of a [[diamond]] from an [[archmage]] in the [[Feywild]].
* "[[/Fire and Darkness|Fire and Darkness]]", stealing a ''[[Book of Vile Darkness]]'' from an [[efreet]].
document_data.Contents:
''Keys from the Golden Vault'' includes the following adventures:
* "[[/The Murkmire Malevolence|The Murkmire Malevolence]]", revolving around the theft of a mystery egg from a museum to prevent a catastrophe.
* "[[/The Stygian Gambit|The Stygian Gambit]]", featuring a heist in an infernally themed casino.
* "[[/Reach for the Stars|Reach for the Stars]]", with a search of a [[Far Realm]]–warped mansion for ''The Celestial Codex''.
* "[[/Prisoner 13|Prisoner 13]]", wherein the adventurers must retrieve a key from a crime boss imprisoned in [[Revel's End]].
* "[[/Tockworth's Clockworks|Tockworth's Clockworks]]", in which a [[deep gnome]] town is besieged by clockwork automata.
* "[[/Masterpiece Imbroglio|Masterpiece Imbroglio]]", with retrieval of a stolen painting from a [[thieves' guild]].
* "[[/Axe from the Grave|Axe from the Grave]]", a story about helping a deceased bard rest by finding their stolen [[mandolin]].
* "[[/Vidorant's Vault|Vidorant's Vault]]", the vault of a famous thief from which a stolen diadem must be recovered.
* "[[/Shard of the Accursed|Shard of the Accursed]]" where to save a town from destruction, adventurers must employ a magical shard to mend a giant's broken heart.
* "[[/Heart of Ashes|Heart of Ashes]]", this time finding a king's lost heart to once again prevent a catastrophe striking a kingdom.
* "[[/Affair on the Concordant Express|Affair on the Concordant Express]]", on a train through the planes, adventurers must get information from someone.
* "[[/Party at Paliset Hall|Party at Paliset Hall]]", with a theft of a [[diamond]] from an [[archmage]] in the [[Feywild]].
* "[[/Fire and Darkness|Fire and Darkness]]", stealing a ''[[Book of Vile Darkness]]'' from an [[efreet]].
